H0.text: In Roman times what was the occupation of a publican. Tax Collector

H1.text: In Roman times what was the occupation of a publican. Innkeeper

H2.text: In Roman times what was the occupation of a publican. Customs Officer

H3.text: In Roman times what was the occupation of a publican. Exciseman

A4.text: Publicans served as tax collectors for the Roman Republic (and later the Roman Empire), farming the taxes of the Roman provinces.

A5.text: In their official capacity, they often [...] managed the collection of port duties.
